reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: Report on the development possibilities of Finland-China rule of law cooperation

description.narrative: The main purpose of the project is to study and clarify potential priority areas methods and possible partners for future bilateral rule of law cooperation between Finland and China. The Department for Americas and Asia of the Ministry for Foreign Affairs will use this report in its planning work for future rule of law cooperation. The project is based on existing contact networks between Rule of Law Finland (ROLFI) and the Supreme Court of the People's Republic of China.
